scripts.restart: docker compose down -v --remove-orphans && docker compose build --no-cache && docker compose up -d --force-recreate
scripts.tmux: npm start && tmux new-session -d -s dev 'docker compose logs -f client' && tmux split-window -v -t dev:0 'docker compose logs -f db' && tmux split-window -h -t dev:0.0 'docker compose logs -f server' && tmux attach-session -t dev
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
